required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prevalence and Characteristics of Transthyretin Amyloidosis in Patients With Left Ventricular Hypertrophy of Unknown Etiology
clinical_study.official_title: PREVALENCE AND CHARACTERISTICS OF TRANSTHYRETIN AMYLOIDOSIS IN PATIENTS WITH LEFT VENTRICULAR HYPERTROPHY OF UNKNOWN ETIOLOGY TTRACK

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this study is to determine the prevalence of ATTR Cardiomyopathy among patients admitted due to Left Ventricular Hypertrophy (LVH) >15mm of unknown etiology by using a 99mTc-tracer scintigraphy based protocol

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with cardiac fixation at the radionuclide bone scintigraphy
primary_outcome.description: To assess the prevalence of patients with cardiac fixation at the radionuclide bone scintigraphy performed with 99mTc-DPD or 99mTc-PYP or 99mTc-HMDP among patients with HCM from undiagnosed etiology

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with mutation at (Transthyretin) TTR coding gene
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the prevalence of hereditary (TTRm) or senile (TTRwt) A-TTR

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with familial history
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the prevalence of patients with familial history of known cardiomyopathy (CM), polyneuropathy (PN), sudden cardiac death (SCD) among their relatives (parents, siblings and 2nd /3rd grade family)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with concomitant signs and symptoms of ATTR amyloidosis
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the prevalence of patients with cardiac fixation at the bone scintigraphy of patients with concomitant signs or symptoms of A-TTR, i.e.: Senso-motor Polyneuropathy Carpal Tunnel syndrome (CTS) Autonomic dysfunction Cardiological manifestations Laboratory signs Others

secondary_outcome.measure: Presence of neurogical signs and/or symptoms compatible with ATTR Polyneuropathy
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the coexistence of typical neurological signs/symptoms even when overlooked at the first evaluation.

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of specific TTR gene mutation if present
secondary_outcome.description: To describe the prevalence of TTR genetic mutation** in patients with cardiac fixation at the bone scintigraphy ( visual grade 1 to 3)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients with LVH of unknown etiology

intervention.description: Diagnosis of TTR amyloidosis cardiomyopathy with scintigraphy
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients with LVH of unknown etiology

study_pop.textblock: Patients with HCM from undiagnosed etiology

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Age ≥ 50 years
- Left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH): (Defined by end-diastolic LV maximum wall thickness (MWT) ≥15mm in ECHO)
Exclusion criteria:
- Etiological diagnosis explaining the LVH:
o Sarcomeric HCM, Myeloma, Fabry disease, Sarcoidosis, Any type of amyloidosis (AA, AL, TTR*...)
- Severe aortic stenosis (Aortic valve area (AVA) < 1.0 cm2)

facility.name: Medizinische Universität Innsbruck - Universitätsklinik für Innere Medizin III, Kardiologie
University Medical Centre Ljubljana - Department of Cardiology

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
